idea-plugin.name: DOM attribute/tag navigation
idea-plugin.description:
DOM Attribute Navigation provides precise jump-to-definition functionality for HTML attributes and tag names in both standard XML files and Vue Single-File Component (.vue) templates. With Ctrl+Click, developers can directly navigate to the corresponding DOM type declarations in lib.dom.d.ts, including HTMLElement properties, GlobalEventHandlers event definitions, and HTML element interface declarations.
Key features include: - Universal support for XML and Vue template files, no extra configuration required - Automatic normalization of syntax (Vue-specific :/v-bind, @/v-on, modifiers like .stop/.once included) - Precise positioning to the exact line of attribute/interface definition with full TypeScript type signature display - Full resolution of DOM inheritance chains (HTMLDivElement → HTMLElement → Element → GlobalEventHandlers, etc.) - Special mapping for common attributes (e.g., class → className) across XML and Vue contexts
This plugin enhances development efficiency by enabling quick access to native DOM type definitions, supporting both traditional XML development and modern Vue-based projects with zero setup overhead.
